name: Iron Quest
description:
Embark on a unique and exciting adventure! Mining and refining materials, crafting weapons and shields, and fighting the evil forces! Can you bring peace back to the kingdom of Thalia?

- Mining and crafting simulations, combined with unique and challenging battle system.
- Over 100 materials and weapons to be collected and crafted.
- Build up your party of heroes across many classes, each with unique attacking strategy, weapon and capability.
- Fight your way throughout 50 stages against fierce enemies and epic boss battles, or fight against endless streams of enemies in the Abyss (Unlocked after completing all the main quests).
- Gamecenter Leaderboards and Achievements supported!
- And yes, we made it as a pure paid game. NO in-app purchase!
